main_definition: Posters are large printed images or messages, typically used to convey information, advertise products or services, or express ideas visually.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Advertising materials made of paper and hung on walls for display
meanings_and_examples.example: The concert organizers put up posters around the city to promote the event.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A large printed message or image that can be seen from a distance, often used as a form of public announcement or protest
meanings_and_examples.example: During the political rally, activists handed out posters with slogans calling for change.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A printed piece of art, often showcasing an image and accompanying text or design
meanings_and_examples.example: The local artist displayed his work on poster-sized canvases at the gallery exhibition.
